title: Online Mathematics Assessment Design Applying Freirean Evaluation Principles

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary mathematics curriculum knowledge and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Need to strengthen competencies in developing practical classroom-applicable assessment tools for current secondary math teachers and education professionals

learning_goals: Design three or more mathematics assessment items reflecting Freirean evaluation principles (dialogicity, reflexivity, co-intentionality).
Document operational procedures for a mobile device-based student blog evaluation system.
Collaboratively develop two types of assessment rubrics with peer teachers.
Derive ten or more formative assessment strategies to promote critical thinking.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
